Entry.Translation: Hat ein Reich überzeugt uns den Krieg zu erklären
Unsere Beute verbrannt und unsere Felder gesalzen
Ein königliches Mündel als Geisel gehalten
Schickte einen Stellvertreter um unsere Delegation zu empfangen
Sich aggressiv beim ersten Aufeinandertreffen verhalten
Die hingerichtet, die Ruinen entweiht haben
Geweigert mi den Barbaren Frieden zu schließen
Anderer Stamm meditierte an unserer Stelle
Bekam ein Geschenk in Form von Kamelen
Schickte Agenten um Unruhe zu schüren
Eroberte eine Stand die wir am angreifen waren
Beanspruchte einen Stadtplatz den wir wollten
Einen Stamm a Tribe to declare on us
Convinced a Nation to declare on us
Ihr habt offen Geredet als wir uns trafen
Gab uns ein Geschenk um die Beziehungen zu verbessern
Akzeptiere Krieg an unseren Feind zu erklären
Weigerte sich Krieg gegen unseren Freind zu erklären
You dispensed justice at our request
Our aggrieved citizens did not receive justice
Your leader's claim to represent justice is a farce!
Allowed us to dispense justice in our way
Refused us justice involving your citizens
You choose another empire over us.
Refused to fire insider on court
You sent us a small gift
We are interested in your suggestion of a research treaty
Refused to aid in holy war
Refused to aid in war on behalf of spouse
You choose us over another empire.
You refused to pay us Tribute
Our research deal ensures your security for now
Your feeble offer triggered our thirst for conflict
Your builder expertise helped us improve our food production
Your technological expertise helped us improve our food production
We may be preparing to attack you
You seem to be preparing for War
We knew you could not be trusted
You solved one of the reasons that we were angry
You tied us up in diplomatic knots
You redressed our primary grievance and signed a Peace treaty
Your military buildup is a provocation
You gifted us materials that were in short supply
Your religious mission to our lands has pleased our people
Your religious mission to our capital was unimpressive
We suspect you of plotting mischief against us
We are grateful to have a trustworthy friend like your Nation
Begged us for a second chance at link(DIPLOMACY_PEACE)
Refused to marry into our royal succession
Worked together to slander rival nation
Returned loot from a tribal raid
Refused to apologize for an international incident
Declined our invitation to a festival
Held a lecture in one of our cities
Took good care of our pilgrims
Refused entry to our peaceful pilgrims
Returned our people despite their crimes
Captured our people for their crimes
Refused to join war on behalf of my people
Joined war on behalf of my people
Took my side in trophy dispute
Did not take my side in trophy dispute
Took my side in diplomatic dispute
Did not take my side in diplomatic dispute
Took my side in theological dispute
Did not take my side in theological dispute
Did not favor me in the council dispute
Favored me in the council dispute
My request for diplomacy was ignored
I was able to keep my consort
Ignored my plea to infiltrate a suspicious neighbor
Ignored my plea to slander a neighbor
Acceded to my request to infiltrate a suspicious neighbor
Acceded to my request to slander a neighbor
Acceded to my request to establish relations with my home country
Ignored to my request to establish relations with my home country
Ordered me to supply bodies for dissection
Kept me on as court merchant
We did not mean to offend
Spared the lives of our spies
Sold us fine works of art
An imposter duped you into insulting us
Our relations are off to a rocky start
You refused to honor our gods
Your friendliness has earned our trust
You respected the Code of Hammurabi
You kissed our ring in defeat
Only one of our cultures will survive this war!
You are braggarts but you do pay your debts
How did we end up at peace with you?
You made us pay a fee to talk with you
Your turn to pay a fee
You are arrogant yet we like you anyway
Your insufferable pride led to war
You are tedious but you paid us to put up with you
We admire your strength and your greed
You bullied us into paying excessive tribute
We admire your strength and your negotiating skill
The gods have touched you with madness!
Notified us of our citizens in distress
You paid us sufficient Tribute for now
Persuaded us to trade with you
Your refusal to pay us Tribute must be punished
Refused to trade us a technology
You refused to pay us Tribute
Paid us Tribute to avoid a War
We are unsettled by your threat to instruct us in the arts of war
We declared War over your refusal to pay Tribute.
Agreed to Cancel Trade with our enemy
Refused to Cancel Trade with our enemy
My request to change the heir was refused
My request to change heir was heeded
Created plan for a Professional Army
I was given a wondrous resting place
Read religious text for pleasure only
My spouse is trying their best
Convinced to give up questionable interests
Refused to take me on a holiday
My spouse cares about my interests
Invited to feast of inner circle
Made a scene at a funeral
Supported my plot for the throne
Sent me on an important exploration mission
Ignored my advice and refused my request
Granted a request for a Barracks assignment
Denied our request to teach at the Barracks
Sided with our view of justice
Supported us in a power struggle
Sided against us in a power struggle
Impressed by skill as an Orator
Someone keeps trying to kill me!
My heir is trying to kill me!
Hat ine Stadt für uns gegründet
Refused to give us a City
Refused to give us a Luxury
Accepted our offer to provide a retinue at court.
Declined our offer to provide a retinue at court.
Declined to offer compensation for pillaged improvements.
Forced us to marry a Barbarian
Protected us from the high priests
Ruler extended a hand in peace
A general celebrated by the people
Refused to celebrate our family general
Took our advice and attacked barbarians
Did not take our side in a family scuffle at court
Did not take our side in a family scuffle at court
Remained a ruler of the people
Elevated a general to the court
Denied request for noble merchant guild
Attended a homecoming feast for the heir
Scolded us after rescuing our hunting party
Protected our hunting party during foreign dispute
Refused to stand up for our beliefs
Refused to fight for our beliefs
Refused to stand up for our values
Refused to fight for our values
Gave away governorship of city seat
Allowed our general to be murdered
Surrendered remains of a fallen relative
Denied the remains of a fallen relative
Ignored displeasure at mistreatment of spouse
Hosted member of the royal family
Punished the heir for street brawl
You did not expel an unruly student.
Forced to kiss foreign ruler's feet
Did not permit family to rule as superiors to locals
Did permit family to rule as superiors to locals
Gave donation to a worthy cause
Shared military technology with our rivals
Ruler would not abduct foreign heir
Ruler ordered assassination of foreign heir
Utilized professional expertise of our elder
Granted a treasury in the Acropolis
Made our family member the Ambassador
Invited us to the new baths
Refused our choice for the Council
Give the {FAMILY-2,1} an ultimatum: join us, or suffer
Refused to support our southern expedition
Comprised with other family on key issue
Agreed with us to focus on exploration
Denied our wish to focus on exploration
Seized family estates to cover debasement induced inflation.
Remembered when you lost your nose and cried
You judged justly and wisely in a dispute between two mothers
You murdered a child in a dispute between two mothers
You ruled in our favor in a dispute between two mothers
You ruled against us in a dispute between two mothers
Sided against us in a legal dispute
Sided with us in a legal dispute
Sided with us after the bathhouse killing
Accused us in the bathhouse murder
Supported us in the wake of the bath murders
Guarded us during a killing spree
Refused to warn of the Antichrist
Destroyed temples in the name of Aten
Sided with family against the priests
Refused a family member burial rites
Allowed a family member burial rites
Stopped us honouring a new god
Encouraged us in honouring a new god
Dealt with a corrupt member of another family
Unjustly killed a member of our family
Sorted out a family dispute in a diplomatic way
Sided against us after general's death
Celebrated the survival of our citizens
Suspects that you killed your heir
Fought for a Family of our faith
Our faith has been given a home
Did not favor us in theological dispute
Refused to join war on behalf of spouse's nation.
Allowed purchase of land for tomb
Would not help free Egyptian slaves
Threatened Egypt with war over our enslaved peoples
Our soldiers fight for Ahura Mazda
Ruler participated in other religion's ritual
Attended the dedication of a new shrine
Rejected the dedication of a new shrine
Showed artifacts of interest to our faith
Laid down arms against the righteous
Allowed pilgrims into our holy city despite a war
Took pilgrims approaching our holy city hostage
Allowed other family to sponsor worship
Took retribution for a religious insult
Treated equally with our religion head
Failed to restore The Great Ziggurat
Restored and Improved The Great Ziggurat
Restored and Improved The Great Ziggurat
Gave us access to sacred landmark
Gave us access to sacred landmark
Stopped the building of a disliked cult
Sided with us in religious schism
Sided against us in religious schism
Refused to make one of the us the Heir
Refused to perform ceremonies for us
Took our bribe and did nothing
Refused to side with us in squabble
Let our rival join honor guard
Refused our candidate for honor guard
Sided with us in land dispute
Sided against us in land dispute
Seized an estate that we claim
Helped some of our Furious citizens
Refused to preside over our ceremony
Refused to abandon support for heir
Got rid of our philosopher friend
Didn't force a match on me
Refused our suitor for your child
Exiled a rival for your attention
Didn't make our child a link(CONCEPT_GENERAL)
Wished to treat with our ambassadors
Allowed us to try to deal with slave revolt
Freed the slaves who killed our family head
Gave into the demands of the slave revolt
Allowed autonomous rule of our city
